ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What will convey to you what the Day of Judgement is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: What do you know what the Day of Recompense is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will never be able to escape from it. Would that you knew what the Day of Judgment is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what do you know – of what sort is the Day of Justice!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what will make you know what the Day of Recompense is
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what will make you realize what the day of judgment is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And what shall teach thee what is the Day of Doom?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Day of Judgment is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What will make you realize what the Day of Judgement will be?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what shall make thee know whatsoever the Day of Requital is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And what will show you what is the Day of Retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what will make you know what the Day of Recompense is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What could let you know what the Day of Recompense is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But what will convey to you what the Day of Justice is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:17] And what would show you, [what would] inform you, what the Day of Judgement is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ah, what will convey unto thee) Muhammad (what the Day of Judgement is!) what is the Day of Reckoning. (Again, what will convey unto thee) Muhammad
